cetus.analysis

Class Section

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Section.ELEMENT>
          • cetus.analysis.Section
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Section.ELEMENT>, java.util.Collection<Section.ELEMENT>, java.util.List<Section.ELEMENT>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class Section
extends java.util.ArrayList<Section.ELEMENT>
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Class Section represents a list of array subscripts that expresses a subset of the whole array elements. Each element in the list should be an object of Section.ELEMENT.
    See Also:
    Section.ELEMENT, Section.MAP, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Section.ELEMENT
      Represents the elements contained in a section.
      static class  Section.MAP
      Class MAP represents map from variables to their sections.

        Expand every section under the constraints given by the range domain.
        Parameters:
        rd - the given range domain.
        ivs - the set of symbols to be expanded.
        vars - the set of symbols that should not be part of the expansion.

      • substituteForward

        public void substituteForward(RangeDomain rd,
                     java.util.Set<Symbol> avoid)
        Substitutes any variables having symbolic constant values in the section avoiding cases that produces expression having a variable in the "avoid" set.
